    • startGame

      public static void startGame(Player player)
      Starts a game by putting a player into a game if there is an existing open game. If there are no existing games the method calls createDefaultGame(player).
      Parameters:
      player -

    • setUpGame

      public static Map<Integer,List<Integer>> setUpGame(Game game)
      Sets up the game by dealing out the cards to each of the 4 players. Returns a map containing each player hand and an identifying key: 1, 2, 3, or 4.
      Parameters:
      game -
      Returns:
      cardMap

    • setCardCenterPile

      public static SlapQueue<Integer> setCardCenterPile(SlapQueue<Integer> centerPile, SlapQueue<Integer> playerPile)
      Simulates setting a card in the center pile, mainly the part of removing the card from the player's hand and adding it to the game's center pile.

    • createDefaultGame

      private static void createDefaultGame(Player playerToPut)
      Creates a default game with a standard rule set. Puts the player into the game and stores the game's id for further use.
      Parameters:
      playerToPut -
